/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngTo.repository.MtngToMapper.selectListMtngTo */ SELECT MTNG_ID , MTNG_TYPE_CD , ( select CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then ccd.code_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then ccd.code_nm2 ELSE ccd.code_nm3 END AS mtngTypeNm from com_code_detail ccd where ccd.code_id = em.mtng_type_cd AND ccd.grp_code = 1014 ) , CMT_ID , ( select CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cd.dept_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then cd.dept_nm2 ELSE cd.dept_nm3 END AS CMT_NM from com_dept cd where cd.dept_cd = em.CMT_ID AND cd.upr_dept_cd = 'CMT' ) , DGR_CD , OPEN_DTM , CLOSE_DTM , MTNG_PLC , AGE_CD , RMK , STAT_CD , REG_ID , REG_DT , MOD_ID , MOD_DT , DUE_DTM FROM EBS_MTNG em WHERE 1=1 AND em.stat_cd = '1'
AND (em.age_cd = #{searchAgeCd})
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(em.due_dtm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{searchFromDate}, ' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(em.due_dtm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{searchToDate}, ' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngTo.repository.MtngToMapper.selectMtngTo */ SELECT em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1014',em.mtng_type_cd,#{lang}) as mtng_type_nm , em.dept_cd , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm3,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.excn_cycl , em.due_dtm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.reg_id , em.reg_dt FROM kgst.ebs_mtng em join kgst.com_dept cd on (em.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd) WHERE em.MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngTo.repository.MtngToMapper.selectListMtngAttendant */ SELECT vum.member_id --국회의원아이디 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as member_nm , vum.dept_cd , vum.cmit_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.dept_nm_kg,vum.dept_nm_ru,vum.dept_nm_ko,#{lang}) as dept_nm , vum.poly_cd , vum.poly_nm , ema.atdt_div_cd from kgst.view_user_member vum join ebs_mtng_attendant ema on ( vum.member_id = ema.atdt_user_id) WHERE 1=1 AND ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId} ORDER BY dept_nm, member_nm

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngTo.repository.MtngToMapper.selectListMtngAgenda */
SELECT ema.mtng_id , em.bill_id -- 안건 ID , em.bill_no -- 안건 번호 , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg,em.bill_name_ru,em.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name , kgst.fngetlangnm(cm.member_nm_kg,cm.member_nm_ru,cm.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm , em.ppsr_id -- 발의자 아이디 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , ema.rslt_cd -- 처리결과 , ema.ord , emt.dept_cd , emc.cmt_cd , emc.cmt_se_cd FROM kgst.EBS_MASTER em join kgst.EBS_MTNG_AGENDA ema on (em.bill_id = ema.bill_id) join kgst.ebs_mtng emt on (ema.mtng_id = emt.mtng_id) join kgst.view_user_member cm on (em.ppsr_id = cm.member_id) join kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc on (em.bill_id = emc.bill_id) WHERE 1=1 AND ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId} and emc.cmt_cd = emt.dept_cd order by ema.ord
